item.title: 中国 1,000 亿美元做空美元令对冲基金受益匪浅
item.description:
国有银行正在帮助支持人民币，而这一交易正使它们蒙受巨大的潜在损失。【原文：

State-owned banks are helping support the yuan and the trade is saddling them with huge potential losses.

item.title: TGI Friday's 因文件延迟而失去资产控制权
item.description: 在 TGI Friday's Inc. 未能按时向债券持有人提交文件后，该公司管理层失去了对连锁餐厅大部分资产和职能的日常控制。【原文：TGI Friday’s Inc. management has lost day-to-day control of much of the restaurant chain’s assets and functions after the company failed to file documents to bondholders on time.】

item.title: J.J.Crew 4.5 亿美元再融资，重返贷款市场
item.description: J.以掀起一波有争议的融资交易而闻名的预科生服装零售商 J Crew 周四推出了一笔 4.5 亿美元的杠杆贷款，用于债务再融资。【原文：J. Crew, the preppy clothing retailer known for kicking off a wave of controversial financing deals, launched a $450 million leveraged loan on Thursday to refinance debt.】

item.title: 雕塑家首席信息官称债权人的暴力行为是 "资本主义在作祟
item.description: Sculptor Capital Management 的首席投资官吉米-列文（Jimmy Levin）认为，向债务重组公司提供新资金是 "过去一两年企业信贷市场的最佳机会"。【原文：Providing fresh capital to companies restructuring their debt has been “the best opportunity in the corporate credit market over the last year or two”, according to Sculptor Capital Management’s Chief Investment Officer Jimmy Levin.】

item.title: 1,650 亿美元的浪潮将货币基金资产推向新纪录
item.description: 投资者连续第五周向美国货币市场基金投入现金，这是美联储降息后需求强劲的最新迹象。【原文：Investors poured cash into US money-market funds for a fifth-straight week, offering the latest indication that demand is strong in the face of the Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 收益率曲线正在逆转。我为什么要关心？
item.description: 美国国债收益率曲线引发投资者和经济学家的恐慌由来已久。这主要是因为当它从通常的向上倾斜倒挂起来，即所谓的倒挂时，交易者就会开始对经济的健康状况感到焦虑。自 1955 年以来，几乎每次经济衰退之前都会出现曲线倒挂，除了最近在 2022 年出现的倒挂。当曲线像 9 月 4 日那样出现反转或恢复到正常形状时，有人说这可能预示着经济将出现衰退。【原文：The US Treasury yield curve has a long history of raising alarms among investors and economists. That’s mostly because when it’s flipped upside down from its usual upward slope in what’s called an inversion, traders start getting anxious about the health of the economy. Almost every recession since 1955 has been preceded by an inverted curve, except recently when it inverted in 2022. When the curve disinverts, or returns to its normal shape, as it did on Sept. 4, some say that could signal a dow】

item.title: 零食制造商为私募股权投资提供 10%的可观收益率
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）和 Frito-Lay 公司（Frito-Lay）最受欢迎的一些食品背后的零食制造商正在向债券投资者提供两位数的收益率，以便为其私募股权所有者的 4 亿美元支付提供资金。【原文：The snack maker behind some of Walmart Inc. and Frito-Lay’s most popular treats is offering bond investors double-digit yields to finance a $400 million payout to its private equity owner.】

item.title: 保尔森希望美国拥有世界上最大的主权财富基金
item.description: 对冲基金亿万富翁约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）说，美国应该建立一个超过挪威1.7万亿美元资金池的主权财富基金，对于一个一直在努力控制万亿美元赤字的国家来说，这是一个雄心勃勃但又不太可能实现的目标。【原文：Hedge fund billionaire John Paulson said the US should build a sovereign wealth fund that surpasses Norway’s $1.7 trillion money pool, an ambitious if unlikely goal for a country that has struggled to rein in trillion-dollar deficits.】

item.title: 法官延长波多黎各公用事业破产诉讼中止期
item.description: 波多黎各政府拥有的电力公司破产案的主审法官继续暂停与该案有关的诉讼，因为电力供应商及其债权人正在谈判一项可能的减债协议。【原文：The judge overseeing the bankruptcy for Puerto Rico’s government-owned electric utility continued a pause on litigation related to the case as the power provider and its creditors negotiate a possible debt-cutting deal.】

item.title: 埃及天然气产量骤降，寻求进口液化天然气过冬
item.description: 埃及正寻求从 10 月份开始购买 20 批液化天然气，这也是埃及多年来首次在冬季来临之前进口这种燃料。【原文：Egypt is seeking to buy 20 cargoes of liquefied natural gas starting in October, marking the first time in years it will import the fuel in the run up to winter.】

item.title: 巴尼耶向勒庞极右翼伸出援手以求稳定
item.description: 法国新任总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）呼吁法国各政治派别齐心协力，走出过去两个月来造成严重混乱的动荡局面。【原文：France’s new prime minister, Michel Barnier, made a plea for the country’s political factions to work together in order to move beyond the turbulence that’s caused so much chaos over the past two months.】

item.title: 墨西哥批准促进市场上市的规则草案
item.description: 墨西哥财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）周四表示，墨西哥证券监管机构批准了一项旨在促进小型公司债券和股票上市的法律规则草案。【原文：Mexico’s securities regulator approved draft rules for a law designed to boost debt and equity listings by smaller companies, Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio said on Thursday.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔最高警戒监狱再遭无人机袭击
item.description: 一架无人机在厄瓜多尔一所关押高级囚犯的监狱屋顶上爆炸，重演了 2023 年 9 月的袭击事件。【原文：An aerial drone exploded on the roof of a prison in Ecuador holding high-profile inmates in a repeat of an attack in September 2023.】

item.title: 德国莱弗森银行称推迟出售俄罗斯业务部门，股票被冻结
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG（莱菲森国际银行股份公司）称，俄罗斯一家法院下令冻结其在该国的分支机构的股份；这使得旷日持久的出售工作进一步复杂化。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG said a Russian court ordered shares of its unit in the country to be frozen — further complicating protracted efforts to sell it.】

item.title: 大选前市政债券销售将飙升至四年新高
item.description: 各州和地方政府准备以四年来最快的速度出售债务，因为借款人希望提前应对 11 月美国总统大选带来的潜在波动。【原文：States and local governments are poised to sell debt at the fastest clip in four years as borrowers aim to get ahead potential volatility from the US presidential election in November.】

item.title: 美联储就调整贴现窗口征求意见
item.description: 美联储周四表示，它正在考虑修改银行和信用社在面临压力时通常使用的贷款机制的操作方法。【原文：The Federal Reserve on Thursday said it’s looking to amend the operational practices of its facility typically used by banks and credit unions in times of stress.】

item.title: Amundi 合作为富裕人士提供美国私人信贷
item.description: Amundi SA 和 First Eagle 投资管理公司正寻求为一项新的私人信贷战略筹集多达 50 亿美元的资金，该战略将为欧洲、中东和亚洲的富裕人士提供向美国中型企业发放私人贷款的机会。【原文：Amundi SA and First Eagle Investment Management are looking to raise as much as $5 billion for a new private credit strategy that will offer wealthy individuals in Europe, the Middle East and Asia access to private loans made to mid-size US companies.】

item.title: 本-威尔逊重返摩根大通，领导美洲能源并购业务
item.description: 本杰明-威尔逊（Benjamin Wilson）将从古根海姆证券公司（Guggenheim Securities）重新加入摩根大通，负责北美地区与自然资源相关的咨询业务。【原文：Benjamin Wilson is rejoining JPMorgan Chase & Co. from Guggenheim Securities to oversee natural resources-related advisory in North America.】

item.title: 格拉平斯基将 2025 年波兰税率下调重新提上日程
item.description: 波兰央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）表示，如果通胀得到控制，明年年中左右有可能降息，他的言辞有所缓和。【原文：Poland’s central bank Governor Adam Glapinski said an interest-rate cut is possible around the middle of next year if inflation stays under control, softening his rhetoric.】

item.title: 蓝筹公司债务潮创下史上最热两日成交量
item.description: 在美国蓝筹股公司债市场连续两天创下销售记录之后，周四又有 11 家公司希望出售债券，而且从主要指标来看，证券需求保持强劲。【原文：After two days of record sales in the US blue-chip corporate debt market, another 11 companies are looking to sell bonds on Thursday, and demand for the securities is holding strong by key measures.】

item.title: 文件显示，拉里-埃里森将在交易后控制派拉蒙公司
item.description: 据一份监管文件显示，在由软件亿万富翁拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）的儿子大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）领导的集团完成对雷德斯通（Redstone）家族在这家电影和电视公司的股权收购之后，哥伦比亚广播公司的母公司派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）将由软件亿万富翁拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）控制。【原文：Paramount Global, the parent of CBS, will be controlled by software billionaire Larry Ellison after a group led by his son David completes its purchase of the Redstone family’s interest in the film and TV company, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 美银美林称英伟达业绩下滑是买入良机
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Artificial intelligence darling Nvidia Corp. is facing near-term headwinds that are making its valuation look compelling, giving investors an attractive buying opportunity, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 英国将放宽 2030 年海上风电目标
item.description: 英国正准备撤回其在本十年结束前建设 55 千兆瓦海上风力发电能力的目标。【原文：The UK is preparing to pull back its target of building 55 gigawatts of offshore wind capacity by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 法国小麦收成和单产因问题加深而下降
item.description: 法国的软小麦收成将跌至 40 年来的最低点，该国的农场游说团体警告说，产量将受到 "结构性 "损害。【原文：France’s soft-wheat harvest is seen plunging to the lowest in 40 years, and the nation’s farm lobby is warning of “structural” damage to yields.】

item.title: 摩根大通挑选卡斯塔尔多和美国银行的马丁领导中型市值公司并购业务
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has named co-heads of mid-cap mergers and acquisitions in a push to more thoroughly cover smaller companies.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率保持在 2023 年 5 月以来的最低水平
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率保持稳定，为购房者提供了自 2023 年 5 月以来最低的贷款成本。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US held steady, giving homebuyers a crack at the lowest loan costs since May 2023.】

item.title: 美国农业收入降至 1,400 亿美元低于预期
item.description: 尽管玉米和大豆这两种美国最大的农作物价格暴跌，但美国农民今年的收入降幅将小于预期，仅比 2023 年下降 4.4%。【原文：US farmers are poised to see a smaller-than-expected drop in income this year, down only 4.4% from 2023 even as prices of corn and soybeans — America’s two biggest crops — have plummeted.】

item.title: MTN 董事会称正在调查针对其首席执行官的指控
item.description: 非洲用户数量最多的无线服务提供商 MTN 集团有限公司表示，正在调查首席执行官拉尔夫-穆皮塔（Ralph Mupita）涉嫌徇私舞弊的问题。【原文：MTN Group Ltd., Africa’s biggest wireless service provider by subscribers, said it’s probing issues of alleged favoritism by Chief Executive Officer Ralph Mupita.】
